title: [K-12] Cultural Foundations of Lesson Study and Its Application in Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic concepts of science education experiences and instructional design
context.additional_context: Experiences the lesson research process through VR simulations, utilizing smartphone-based collaborative tools

learning_goals: Learners analyze the cultural foundations of Lesson Study and propose strategies applicable to science education.
Learners derive improvements for lesson design through collaborative reflection with peer instructors in a simulation environment.

Learners can complete a lesson study process (topic selection → data collection → scenario design → simulation execution) reflecting cultural characteristics of three or more countries (e.g., South Korea, Japan, USA) in a VR-based virtual classroom within four weeks and validate results through peer evaluation and a checklist (meeting at least four of five criteria).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
